dea
Class DEAPSolution

java.lang.Object
  dea.DEAPSolution

public class DEAPSolution
extends java.lang.Object

This class defines a DEA Problem Solution. All the methods in this class are used to set or get part of a DEA Problem Solution (DEAPSolution).

Author:
Hubert Virtos

setSlackArrayCopy

public void setSlackArrayCopy(int dmuIndex,
                              double[] arrayToCopyFrom,
                              int positionToCopyFrom,
                              int LengthToCopy)
                       throws DEAException
Copies slacks from an array to the Slack Array of the Solution Object. This enables efficient copying of Solver results into the DEAPSolution.slacks array.

Parameters:
dmuIndex - The index of the DMU to copy data to
arrayToCopyFrom - the array to copy slack values from
positionToCopyFrom - the position to copy from in this array
LengthToCopy - the length to copy
Throws:
DEAException
